description.ko: 기하학적 혼돈에 대한 미니멀하면서도 공격적인 탐구로, 완벽한 고체가 데이터 파편의 디지털 폭풍으로 부서지는 모습입니다.
description.en: A minimalist yet aggressive study of geometric chaos, where a perfect solid fractures into a digital storm of data shards.

prompt: A brutalist #1A1A1A obsidian sphere suspended in a sterile #FFFFFF digital void, caught in the middle of a violent geometric deconstruction. The surface is fracturing into a recursive explosion of sharp #808080 shards and #C0C0C0 pixel-sorted glitches. High-contrast cinematic lighting reveals razor-sharp raytraced reflections on fragmented glass-like surfaces. The composition features heavy digital noise, scanlines, and intense chromatic aberration to emphasize chaos within order. 8k resolution, Unreal Engine 5 aesthetic, precise vector shards.
